title: Central Queensland News newspaper blackletter
content:
Hi there, I’m wondering if anyone is able to identify the masthead font used for the Central Queensland News.

Thanks, Nate.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103064327im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cqn_5865.png)
author: veryphatic

comments.content: Hi Nate. The closest I’ve been able to find is [Journalistic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103064327/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ephemera/journalistic/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D72%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DCentral%2520Queensland%2520News%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dot.liga%26seed%3D29). Will keep looking, though.

Those blackletter newspaper nameplates are most often custom designed. See for example the [many designs](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103064327/http:/www.typedesign.com/logos/) by [Jim Parkinson](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103064327/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/foundry/parkinson_type_design/).
